attributes.action: Cancel university exams to follow the cancellation of A-Level, AS and GCSE exams
attributes.additional_details: We are paying £9,250 a year for online learning which isn’t worth what we are paying for. We should be treated the same as other students in full time education. We are going through the pandemic too, which is something the government seems to forget.
attributes.background: Arrange another form of assessment that is available and acceptable for all students. We are still in full time education, with the government forgetting that university students are going through this pandemic too!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

Decisions about university teaching, assessments and exams are a matter for individual universities, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You might like to sign the following petition:

Lower university tuition fees for students until online teaching ends
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911
